sentence.Network_en: My mother waxed eloquent on the theme of wifely duty.
She strove to perform all her wifely functions perfectly.
sentence.Network_cn: 她努力做一个无可挑剔的贤妻。

sentence.Network_en: It was not wifely modesty at all . By so much was her pride satisfied.
sentence.Network_cn: 这根本不是出于妇道人家的稳重,这样做只是满足了她的虚荣心.

entry.def: Wifely is used to describe things that are supposed to be typical of a good wife.

example.ex: She strove to perform all her wifely functions perfectly.
example.tran: 她努力做一个无可挑剔的贤妻。

means.word_mean: 1. of or befitting or characteristic of a wife
